blocks.content:
What is the Autistic Adults Chat 'n' Chill Group? 

The Autistic Adults Chat ‘n’ Chill Group is a once-monthly meetup that takes place on the second Tuesday of the month in the evening. It is an informal get-together fostering opportunities for connections, friendships, activities and recreation. Meetings are held virtually at this time by reason of the pandemic. Meetings and activities will resume with a hybrid model (virtually and in-person) once public health guidelines allow it. This group is Autistic-led and welcomes Autistic adults across New Brunswick ages 18+ and recognized Autistic people (no need for a formal diagnosis).

How do I contact someone if I am interested?

Please contact group organizer Louise Tardif at louise.tardif5@gmail.com
